lore: Mortal myth has it that the Hellflayers of Slaanesh began as devices for mowing the gruesome pleasure-gardens of the Dark Princeâ€™s realm, but that their efficacy in war was soon proven when their wild Daemonette crews unleashed the whirl-bladed murder engines upon the battlefields of realspace.

otherAbilities.Cutting Down the Foe:: Each time this unit is selected to fight, you can select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it and roll one D6, adding 2 to the result if that unit is an INFANTRY unit: on a 2-3, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds ; on a 4-5, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds; on a 6+, that enemy unit suffers D3+3 mortal wounds.
